heroSubtitle: Passionate about programming and Intelligent Automation, loves challenges and hands-on projects
aboutContent: Hello! I'm Chao Lin Chen, currently studying Intelligent Automation Engineering at National Taipei University of Technology. I enjoy exploring different fields, from front-end development to cybersecurity and 3D modeling. Through continuous practice, I aim to combine programming, creativity, and engineering thinking to create functional and aesthetic works while expanding my potential.
project1Content: This website is my first major project, built from scratch using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, learning basic structure, styling, and interactive features.
project2Content: I'm proficient with SolidWorks and hold CSWA and CSWP certifications, capable of precise part design and assembly. Through 3D modeling practice, I gained a complete understanding of product design workflow and mechanical structures.
project3Content: Currently studying cybersecurity fundamentals, including network security concepts, vulnerability scanning, and penetration testing principles. While still learning, I am gradually building practical understanding for future projects.
contactDescription: Feel free to reach out via Email!
